website_summaries.verdict: At less than 8 lbs. with simple features, this is perfect for the elderly.
pros: Simple to use – one switch for floors and another for carpets
Can be mounted to a wall to take up less space
Long wand attachment to clean ceilings and other high places
cons: Be prepared to empty it a few times if you have a large space

website_summaries.verdict: The Shark Rocket combines adequate cleaning power with a broad array of cleaning extensions into a recommendable, affordable, lightweight vacuum. Only its cord holds it back.
pros: Useful attachments and decent performance make the Shark Rocket a contender in the field of lightweight vacuums
cons: The Rocket's cord is inconvenient and means that you likely won't use it for quick clean-up

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service a total disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was great until motor stopped working six months later and customer service would not address issue after contacting three times I gave up. Vacuum now in dump, and we will never purchase another Shark product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Berry

customer_reviews.title: Poor warranty coverage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product June 10, 2017. Was using the vacuum today January 2, 2018. The power head is not working correctly. Called Shark for warranty coverage. I was told t vacuum is warrantied for one year but the power head is not covered by warranty. They offered to sell me a new power head for $49.00 (Plus shipping $14.99) which he said was half price. I only paid $150 for the while thing. I told him this was unacceptable. He finally agree to send me a new power head for the shipping. I guess better than nothing. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No SUCTION
customer_reviews.text: i have owned this vacuum just a little over a year now (Dec 2016) and it stopped picking up anything a few months ago-no suction whatsoever. It was a good vacuum when it worked, just didn't last long. If the suction doesn't work, it is no good to me. otherwise would be a great vacuum. I did appreciate the attachments and going from hard wood to carpet-but again, the suction is no longer working. I don't know who can afford to replace a vacuum every year, but i can't. hopefully it is just my vacuum and not something that should have happened. hoping that the seller will offer to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have to say I'm disappointed. At first this vacuum was great
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I'm disappointed. At first this vacuum was great. Now after only 2years this vacuum takes a dump on me. I'm always having to take it apart and try and figure out what's wrong with it and to little things that are time consuming. For a $200 vacuum it should last longer then 2years. I shouldn't have to buy a new shark vacuum every couple of years that's just ridiculous! I normally wouldn't write a review but I'm extremely disappointed in the quality only lasting 2years. Should last at least 5. I take care of the vacuum and constantly clean it but it didn't help make it last longer. I've had cheaper vacuums last longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: LUke

customer_reviews.title: It’s a whole process. Get the cordless Dyson and save yourself the time and frustration.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on the reviews and price-it is cheaper than the Dyson. To use this vacuum, you’ll have to connect the vacuum to the wand every time. When you are done, you’ll need to disconnect the 2 parts as it will not stand otherwise. This may not sound like a big deal except it doesn’t just slide on and off with a touch of a button- it requires some muscling. It’s possible that I received a defect. In any case, I wound up getting the Dyson V8 and it is infinitely better in every respect. It’s more expensive but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shark loses suction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product less then 10 months ago and the flexible hose cracked for to the vacuum cleaner itself that attaches it and then it made a big giant hole and I'm very disappointed .Had to use duct tape. For the price I would have expected it to work better than that especially when I haven't even had it for 10 months
customer_reviews.author: AVonnie

customer_reviews.title: Very low useful life.
customer_reviews.text: I used this vacuum less than 40 times and it "croaked." I was shocked because it was gently used and should have lasted me many more years. I took the vacuum into the local repair shop and they said it wasn't worth fixing because I'd have to buy a complete new head for it. The problem was the light on the right side of the vacuum head would cut out and the vacuum would stop operating (i.e. sucking in the air). That light would go from green to red. I'm not sure I'd buy another Shark. It is convenient, portable, and light weight. I just didn't get very good mileage from this model. Thank twice before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: satindoll

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: really top heavy the vacuum works good. just tiresome because of weighi if using using very long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one year to date
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year to the date the hose on my vacuum split. Buyer Beware! Replacement part is no longer available. Changed this rating to 5 stars...Got a call from Shark, they are replacing this nozzle free of charge! Excellent customer service for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri O.

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: I received my Shark Rocket yesterday. It works great.. Suction was perfect in picking up all the many threads in my sewing room. I looked for the registration card.......none. Then looked through all the accessories and compared against what the brochure had. Seemed I was missing the wall mount. Very important to me... I contacted Shark and they were able to register my unit with no problems. Seems the wall mount bracket was 'OUT OF STOCK'...... so I just didn't get one. WHAT??? That is really shoddy. The customer service rep was wonderful in ensuring one got ordered but that's pretty sad units are being sent out without everything in tact.
customer_reviews.author: R. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Quick clean-ups
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews and I’m pretty disappointed. It comes with a lot of different attachments, which are very useful, and it’s easy to clean up. The down side for me, is that it gets clogged easily, and it doesn’t have as much suction power as I thought. In fact, I sometimes have to go over the same spot twice to pick up whatever is on the floor. I bought this to replace a bulky and cheaper vacuum I got from my grandparents, but that one definitely cleans better and I’ll be keeping it. This one might be good for cleaning up a quick little mess, but not really deep cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: No-No_no
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well enough, has plenty of useful tools, very light and maneuvers better than the Marines. The dirt receptacle is small, and if you have pets, fills way too soon. The real downfall is the cord is permanently attached, so you have to drag that along to the trash can - stoopid. I would not buy one again. In fact, I got sick of it and bought a more expensive ultra-light with batteries (it's not perfect either - sucks batteries dry) but there is not cord attached. I would seriously, seriously consider something else...like a broom!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Relatively light vacuum that works well on carpet
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vacuum to use on carpeted stairs where our other full size vacuums are hard to use. We decided on a corded model for better power and no limit on time for use. It works very well on carpets and is relatively light. Without the power brush however it doesn't work as well. The suction does not compare with a full size vacuum. But it works well enough for smaller jobs. Emptying the vacuum can easily generate a lot of dust unless you are careful. We prefer vacuums with bags which are a lot cleaner to empty.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sjoman

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst purchase I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst purchase I have ever made. Unless one is at least 5' 5" tall and has really good upper body strength this vacuum is a struggle to even move. In my opinion the term "Ultra Light" does not describe this machine . It isn't just heavy...it is top heavy...all of the weight is at the top of the machine where one tries to push it. The reason I gave it two stars instead of one is because it does pick up the dirt BUT it is a struggle to do it. Since I cannot return it, I am donating it with the suggestion to use only if one has a lot of muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian L. Beban

customer_reviews.title: Missing the "Dust-Away hard floor attachment"
customer_reviews.text: I really can't comment on the quality of this Shark vacuum as I didn't get a chance to try it. It arrived in good condition but was missing the "Dust-Away hard floor attachment" as listed in the description so I returned it. I bought this model based on the fact that it had this attachment. The description is incorrect as this model does not include that item. I have ordered the HV303 as it is also listed as having this attachment. Hopefully it really does include that item or it will also be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ricop

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: Great for its lightness (I'm in my 60s), ability to go under low furniture, low and high powered suction selection for bare and carpeted floors, and ease of emptying dirt from collection chamber. It's easy to change the attachments. I love the ability to vacuum the steps with a powered roller, to really get up the dirt. It picks up hair but it gets wrapped around the roller, so I have to cut the hair away from the roller,, manually to clean the bristles. Love the "under appliance" attachment for all appliances that have a 2" clearance. Have had it for several months and am still pleased with performance and durability. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: PickyButFair

customer_reviews.title: Light and powerful, easy to use on stairs too
customer_reviews.text: We only got it a month ago and we love this vacuum. Such a positive change from our heavy hoover, we don't have to drag it on the stairs. The fact that you can just use the small upper part with a brush, or just with the motorized head is definitely a plus. We can easily vacuum the cat hair off if our microfiber sofas. Easy to empty and the bagless feature is saving us $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Kati R.

customer_reviews.title: This is WONDERFUL w/Pet Hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE this vacuum!!!! I'm a fan of Shark vacuums anyway, but this stick vacuum is WONDERFUL!!!! I got it primarily to pick up dog hair in my large, tiled kitchen/dining room area. Where my electric broom did NOT work well w/lab hair, this works like a dream! It's Excellent on carpeted areas too - in fact, MUCH better than I was expecting! It works as well on carpet as my much pricier Kirby....& is more maneuverable! Plus, the capability to switch out so easily to other functions makes it a joy to use. I HIGHLY Recommend this product!!!!! ******
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few different vaccums designed to remove pet hair, and this one works! Love the versatility of the attachments and the various levels of suction is convenient. The only down side to me, and kept me from a 5 star rating, is it's top heaviness when used as an upright vacuum. If you need to set it aside for anything while assembled as an upright it will take effort to find a good place to rest it or it could easily fall since you likely won't want to take it apart each time you pause your work. However; this one design flaw is not too big of drawback considering how great it works and its price.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Used to be a good produst
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased three of these, two for my use and one as a gift. They were fantastic. When I purchased this one I discovered that they were cheaped down. The cord to plug it in is about half as long as previously supplied, To empty the dirt reservoir it is necessary to pick up the entire appliance and hold it upside down over a bin to empty. Previously there was a removable dirt reservoir that could easily be taken for disposal. Previous models had led lights that shone ahead on the area to be vacumed. No more. This used to be a good product. Now there are superior quality products available from other manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Fortmann

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for this vac because it is listed as a top three machine in Consumer Reports "Best Vacs for Dog Hair." Even though I'd read many reviews touting the vac's amazing ability to suck up dirt and dog hair, I was still amazed as how much comes up! It is so light weight that I don't have any problem with the canister being at the top (in my 60's and with arthritis) and I easily store it in the front cloak closet by leaving the canister separate after emptying it at the end of vacuuming. I'll never go back to the big, heavy and very ineffectual models. Such a high quality item at such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Chalyse

customer_reviews.title: had this for two years now, still works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing for stairs and for all of the smaller attachments it's got. A well rounded cleaning machine. Not too heavy, good chord length. Most importantly it cleans well, gets carpets and wood floors and harder to reach spots. Easy to empty and clean when needed. It has some longevity too. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Best money spent
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I’ve had a Dyson for 12 yrs that finally broke, but I didn’t want to pay $400 again to buy a new one. This vacuum is awesome! It’s light weight, easy to store, more convenient to use on the stairs, has a set of detailing accessories for the car which is a huge bonus, and the suction is perfect. I have carpet and wood floor. It has more suction then my Dyson did and even though there was a ball on my Dyson for mobility, this Shark moves much more smoothly and gets into the tight spaces. I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: R8CH

customer_reviews.title: Great size and weight
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum for it's weight and size. It makes going room to room and doing stairs much easier than the large upright I had prior. What I don't like is the suction. It's great for dust and small things, but having kids I get pieces of crackers, paper, plastic wrapper pieces, etc. I usually use the broom before I vacuum because of this, but my old upright handled such items without a problem. I also wish there was a way it would stand on it's own without leaning on a wall.
customer_reviews.author: scrapbookqueen87

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!! Hardwood floors, rugs, furniture, pet hair removal, you name it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently adopted a dog who sheds like there's no tomorrow - I was struggling to keep our tiny apartment and furniture clean. This vacuum is a total dream. I LOVE the hardwood floor attachment - our apartment is mostly wood floor and tiles, and this vacuum makes quick work of all the floors. Not a single hair, dust bunny, or particle of dust is left. The rug attachment with rotating bristles cleans our couch so quickly and so efficiently. It picks up dog hair like nothing else. Our couch looks brand new each time we vacuum it. All the attachments, ease of use, and power of this vacuum are incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: STUPID IDEA!!
customer_reviews.text: UGH!! The collection tank is not a separate piece that can be detached and carried to trash WITHOUT the long cord. To empty the collection tank you have to roll up the cord in your hand and carry it with you to the trash can and push the release button while holding the vacuum motor and the cord. Unless, you drop the cord, and then empty the tank and then roll up the cord again in your hand!
customer_reviews.author: Extremely Pissed Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less Than Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum will work good enough, but it is pretty underwhelming. It clogs often with dog hair. By often, I mean every single use. It clogs in the plastic housing and has to be pulled out by hand. Suction is okay, it works on dust, but pretty weak on things like gravel. It is top heavy and you have to lay it down to walk away. The cord management system is not existent. It IS good at being a lightweight vacuum to get into corners.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Handle caught on fire!
customer_reviews.text: The item caught on fire after using only a couple times! My son was cleaning the hardwood floors when he said the handle was starting to smoke. When I grabbed it from him the handle caught on fire! My son could have seriously injured his hand! I’ve tried requesting a return or refund and haven’t heard anything back. Definitely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carri Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts. Okay Suction. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Wall mount missing. I'm having trouble contacting the company about it and finding the serial number on my vacuum to register it. I want to love this, but I can only say that I really like it. I'm trying to remember that it isn't a $500 vacuum so I have to be realistic. The suction is okay. It is good for my hard floor, stairs, and area rugs, but it takes many swipes through, so that makes me wonder if it is really sucking up what it is supposed to. There are times it is just pushing debris. The car accessories seem to weaken the suction and don't work.
customer_reviews.author: skater

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I truly enjoy this vacuum. I shopped for literal hours and days for a “great buy” and when I finally Made the plunge for this one I can honestly say it’s perfect. I love the auction power and the settings for carpet it has. It pulls up everything well and has a special groove to cut hair that gets attached to the spool. It’s easy to maintain in cleanliness and worth every penny. It doesn’t come with a stand and doesn’t stand up by itself however it does stand against the wall due to grips and is not a big deal to me. DEFINITELY GET THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Like the versatility of the unit. Nice and compact and does the job. Just wish a round brush attachment was available for cleaning ceilings and the like. Love the extra long cord that allows me to do a long flight of stairs. Bought this to replace my old fabulous Kirby - a heavy awkward dinasour, even though it was a 30 year workhorse and cleaned very well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Swidergal

customer_reviews.title: A light-weight DYNAMO!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wonderful lady who cleans my house once a month suggested I purchase a Shark Rocket vacuum because of the many ways it can be used: as an upright, as a furniture vacuum, to clean ceiling fans, & much more. I tried it out today & I am amazed at the amount of suction it produces & how easy it is to use. It’s light, it gets under furniture, & it has many accessories for different uses. Also, the price of $149 is 25% less than the retail price, so it’s a win-win. So glad I asked a professional’s advice!
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn2222

customer_reviews.title: I like it enough that I bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vacuum about a year ago from Home Depot. Unfortunately one of our animals got sick with something contagious so to be safe we discarded that vacuum to avoid spreading the illness after we disinfected everything. When we were looking for a replacement vacuum we decided to buy this one again. It works well and it is lightweight. I only wish it were cordless and had a self cleaning brush. We almost bought the cordless shark vacuum but I couldn’t justify the extra $100 for it. I like the accessories that came with it as well. We use the tiny brush to clean our bookshelves and windowsills and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Cat hair
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats, so having a vacuum that picks up their hair from upholstered furniture is of the utmost importance to me, but this one does not. On floors and carpets, it does OK. Its head is small, so it can get into and under small spaces, but the cup part doesn't hold much and has to be emptied often. I learned I had to be careful when opening it because, if not done correctly, all that I collected will dump out onto the floor. For me, it's not ultra-light; it's heavy, and it's very loud. I doubt that it will do a good job on the inside of my car. I don't recommend buying this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Susie the Swimmer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 long hair white retrievers. We bought this vaccum for our brand new RV. Since we got the dogs we have tried many vaccums. In out home after trying many (4) shark works the best. So it was only Shark vaccum for our new RV. We camped in it for the weekend just vaccumed it with my new vaccum. So much hair from the dogs. The canister was completely full. Best vaccum ever. Plus all the attachments. My husband said we already have a shark vaccum. He put it together for me me and showed me the attachments. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Haylansi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maneuver in tight places
customer_reviews.text: I love my Shark Rocket! I purchased it to use in our RV while we travel in the summer. It worked wonderfully on both the carpet and the hard flooring. It was easy to manage around the bed which is a tight squeeze, and under the table. I like it so well, that I brought into our condo to use this winter because of the ease of handling it.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming Melody

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this vacuum been all my life??? ITS AMAZING. I have all hard floors and one area rug in my living room. It’s soooo easy to use on the hard floors with the hard floor extension. It designed to suck up near the wall and gets under my dining room table easily. And with a 4 year old and 2 year old, my floors are covered in crumbs and dirt 24/7. This thing is so light weight my 2 year old and push it around on the rug. It’s a dream of a vacuum. I am a shark fan for life.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Eco-Conscious and Meets All Your Cleaning Needs Under 1,500 sf
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little vacuum for a small home. I love that there are no bags—eco- and cost-conscious—it has a long cord so that you can reach every corner of a room without having to change outlets and all of its attachments cover just about any cleaning need you have. It’s also a pretty powerful small vacuum. I rarely have to go over a space several times to get it clean. I would highly recommend this vacuum for people with a need for a powerful vacuum, want to be eco-conscious and have a space smaller than 1,500sf.
customer_reviews.author: Lex C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Little Vaccuum
customer_reviews.text: This little vaccuum sucks! (In the best way possible). We've had our other vaccuum for about 7 years and the first time I used this little bad boy it picked up SO. MUCH. JUNK. I seriosuly couldn't believe how much our other vaccuum was missing. Love all the attachments too! Especially the little duster attachment. Great for dusting places that aren't easy (book shelves, baseboards, even blinds!) I read a few reviews giving it a lower rating because the vaccuum doesn't stand up by itself. Those people didn't read the instructions 😉. The top part detaches from the main stick and then hooks on to said stick. Stores great inside our coat closet.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Munson

customer_reviews.title: I love the shark brand
customer_reviews.text: I love the shark brand. I have had other shark brand vacuums and this one out beats them all personally! I love the long cord, the fast dumping and the easy cleaning of everything, and being able to detach the top or the bottom. I can remove the brush on the bottom and clean it easily. The brush on the bottom has a line through it so you can cut the hair or fabric, whatever you pick up and clean it out fast. Also I have owned so many other vacuum brands and the suction on the sharks are always the best.
customer_reviews.author: Evonne

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile, maneuverable, and useful
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is great. It's very maneuverable and picks up everything: cat hair, my hair, dirt, dust, and more. I use it on hardwood floors, a low pile carpet, and a high pile carpet and it works very well on all three (and doesn't destroy the carpet). It comes with a lot of attachments, including car detail kit (not tested), pet attachment with a brush on the end, hard floor attachment, and motorized brush. The latter is really great, I find that the vacuum stays easy to use even over carpets where other vacuums latch on a little too much. Can't recommend this vacuum enough, really good performance for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Total win!
customer_reviews.text: This was a total win of a product. I researched stick vacuums and decided that I didn't want to part with the cheddar Dyson required. After using stick vacuums of family and friends, cordless quickly lost it's charm - I want to be able to vacuum more that 20 minutes without recharging. This was the perfect solution. It's a brilliant machine and comes with lots of accessories. It's light and super portable, making nearly any job, including stairs a breeze. If you want a powerful but light vacuum, this is a great one and merits its excellent reviews.
customer_reviews.author: CT Pacifica

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have a rather small two-bedroom condo (no stairs to vacuum). I absolutely love this lightweight vacuum with so many positive features. It's very easy to convert to a hand-held vacuum in order to use the attachments for a variety of cleaning. Be sure to get the one that includes attachments. That makes all the difference to me. It's so easy to navigate around furniture, etc., because of the swivel head. And it lays almost flat to easily get under furniture. The small container that holds the dirt that's vacuumed up has to be emptied fairly often, but it's easy to do. The price is great for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Judy B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about a month ago, and I couldn't be happier. It works well on hardwood, ceramic, and carpet. The best part is it's very light (compared to my heavy canister vacuum) so I have no problems using it every day. I also like the fact that it's corded so I don't have to worry about charging it. The price is right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sof

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lightweight versatile vacuum and this is not it. It's very loud since the motor is at top of the handle and I am short so it was very uncomfortable. It didn't get under my furniture which is a big deal to me with cat hair everywhere. It didn't pick up dust along the baseboards. You have to lay it down when you stop vacuuming because it topples....a big nuisance. It all added up to return it within a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: kit & bella

customer_reviews.title: Great portable and efficient vacuum for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Heard good things about the shark and decided to take a chance! It's been about two months now and we love it. One big issue with our old vacuum was dragging it up and down the stairs. The shark comes apart and transporting around is super simple! It also can be used like a dust buster without the long tube attachment making it great for quick spills jobs or awkward locations. Overall it's been great and was totally worth the money. If I had to point out a negative it would be that my initial reaction was that it initially felt cheap but it's doing the job and that's what really matters.
customer_reviews.author: Jablonski

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog hair
customer_reviews.text: I love my new vacuum? I have 2 golden retrievers and this picks up the dog hair great. Very lightweight and easy to handle and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Compact and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this little vacuum for about a year now and we love it. I did a lot of research before ordering it and I’m glad we picked this one. It come with lots of attachments, it works very well with all of the rugs in our home and the hardwood attachment does well with our wooden floors. The only thing I don’t like doing is having to unplug the vacuum to carry it and dump it out since the cord is attached to the part that releases everything. Once you roll the cord up and hang the vacuum on the long base it’s really compact and takes up hardly any space!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Langham

customer_reviews.title: Was happy for a little while!
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed my Shark for 7-8 months but lately the bottom head no longer has sunction and the brush doesn't spin. I checked the belt, cleaned the brush out, and checked if I had anything plugged and it still doesn't work. So disappointed and not sure what to do! I should have registered my vacum for the 1 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER !
customer_reviews.text: I have over that past 40 years owned all manner of Hoover and Oreck cleaners. I have paid hundreds of dollars for them. This Shark is powerful, really powerful. So light weight. Easy to manouver. The cleaning power head has a low clearance to get under furniture. Easy to empty dust bin. I HIGHLY recommend it. Really ! take it from a professional neat freak... best vacuum out there...REALLY !
customer_reviews.author: Brad Coath

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Shark Rocket ultra light vacuum! I have neck, shoulder, lower back and knee issues, this vacuum is so easy to use I can now vacuum again. We have three dogs and two cats not to mention five people living in a small home. The vacuum is light weight holds more in the canister then I ever thought it would. You can stand in one spot and do a whole radius around you cause the bottom vacuum attachment rotates very easily. Not good at writing reviews but felt I must cause this product was a big game changer!
customer_reviews.author: Caud

customer_reviews.title: Great - if you don't mind...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum if you don't mind vacuuming with a real vacuum after you vacuum with this vacuum. It's clogs easily and is extremely loud. "Besides that, Mrs. Lincoln, what did you think of the play?"
customer_reviews.author: Craig Marshall Smith

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 Months Old and No Longer Works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vacuum 2.5 months ago and it's already broken. Doesn't suck and actually drops old dust and dirt everywhere making my apartment dirtier than when I started. Very frustrating. I've cleaned it out after almost every use and that didn't keep it functional. Why do you have to pay $400 to get a vacuum that picks up dirt? IT HAD ONE JOB!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia R Gerde

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This has been great so far! We’ve had it for 3 weeks, and I vacuum often since our dog sheds a lot in the summer. Our entire house is hardwood floors, so the attachment is awesome for that. I also use the main power head for a big rug in our living room, and the two power suction modes are helpful so it doesn’t get caught in the edges of the rug. Overall, I think this is great value for the cost. The tank fills up pretty fast, but our house is little (900sqft) and with all this dog fur, I can still vacuum the whole house before I have to empty the tank.
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Light an easy to use
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I still owned a bag vacuum and had to push it around the house. This vacuum pulls itself and has great suction power. The Hardwood Floor Hero attachment is perfect since my entire house is hardwood or tile. I vacuum everyday and use the roller attachment for the area rugs every other day and find that I usually empty the container twice a week. The cord reaches every room except the bathroom, I live in a 1920 tiny bungalow/craftsman.
customer_reviews.author: JPM

customer_reviews.title: Am so happy I picked my Rocket !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best vacuum I have ever had and I used to love my Kerby. This is so light it really lifts the nap of your carpet so the suction can reach all the way down to lift dirt and all hair out . I have 2 cats, clean up is so easy on floors and furniture. The cat tree always looks new after a quick pass of the rocket. I have had this for 3 months now and would highly recommend this vacuum. I'm thrilled I purchased the right vacuum. After spending the last year in chemo and being 65 this light weight wonder is a blessing. It's AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R.

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I use this vacuum on my hardwood floors and the suctions power is very good. Getting up the stairs is no problem as the extension cord is long. It's a breeze to empty and I like that it comes with so many accessories. It's a little top heavy but most of these type vacuums are. It's definitely no problem handling. This vacuum can reach just about anywhere from the floor to the ceilings and vacuuming under beds is so easy. I even look forward to using it! I highly recommend this product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SHAG RUGS
customer_reviews.text: I received this product yesterday and gave it a try. Works fine on bare floors and low-piled rugs. However, when I tried to use it on my shag rug, the vacuum jammed and the red light lit up. Same with both settings. I called customer service about the issue and was told that it was not designed for shag rugs. Now they tell me!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S. Odell

customer_reviews.title: Only one dislike: you have to take the entire corded canister ...
customer_reviews.text: This is about the most powerful little vacuum I have ever owned. Only one dislike: you have to take the entire corded canister to the the trash to empty the container. Otherwise, SUPER!!! Works great on hardwood floors. I didn't realize just how must "Junk" was embedded in my rugs. It has picked up the same amount of "Dirt" all three times I ran it over thisrea. Amazed at just powerful it is. I got corded because of past issues with "battery/chargeable" units. Glad I got this with a cord.
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Terrible vacuum. Looses suction every time its used. Constantly gets clogged. The canister is way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to move
customer_reviews.text: I like how light weight this is so I can easily carry between levels of my house. It has good suction especially for the size. It works on hardwood and carpet. My only complaint is that it is too heavy so you can’t stand it up between jobs. It either lays down or you have to hang it up on the kit it provides. It is really narrow so if you’re okay with taking a bit longer for big spaces it’s just fine
customer_reviews.author: taylorslp0807

customer_reviews.title: Most Impressive Vacuum Ever - Would have given it 6 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wait to write reviews...but just used this vacuum just in my small living room and it sucked up dust and my fine long hair that the other vacuum I bought (and returned) did not pick up 1 week ago. I am sold on the Shark Rocket - they have EXCEEDED expectations, not only in it's performance but all the additional features that were unexpected. Thanks to whoever is behind designing this HIGH QUALITY vacuum. (I think this is the best review of any product I have ever written.)
customer_reviews.author: C_Dixon

customer_reviews.title: best cleaner yet!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these and gave it away to a friend in need. In the mean time got a different brand, to find that I was disappointed with the more expensive replacement. So, I bought another of these and have never been so happy! it is so efficient, and the swivel on the head makes it so easy to get to difficult places. Easily emptied, my only change would be to go cordless next time....dragging the cord along to empty it is a little tiresome. Apart from that, it is a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This little baby is a champ!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite vacuum. With four really hairy dogs we've gone through more than our share of vacuums over the years, including a Dyson. This one makes stairs a breeze, and easily moves from hard floors to carpet. My only gripe is that I wish the roller bar was easier to clean. I end up cleaning it after each vacuuming day to prevent it from burning out (already had that experience). I also wish that the cord bracket (that thingy you wrap the cord on) was attached only on the base, and not the power head. Minor issues. This little baby is a champ!
customer_reviews.author: kellyd7011

customer_reviews.title: I freakin love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. Yes, I also love to vacuum. I didn't know it came with a hard wood floor attachment and I was really excited about that because I have a lot of cats in the house, hence a lot of hair! The attachment for carpet almost pulls me across the room, you can tell its working well. Emptying it out is really easy. I like that it plugs into the wall so I don't have to worry about it dying
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews, I decided to buy this item and have been disappointed with not only the quality of it but lack of performance. The vacuum lost suction power after having it for less than 6 months. I even bought 4 sets of filters as a precaution to maintain it in good working order. The power cord is failing since it's not placed in the brightest spot, I would not recommend this product to any of my friends or family.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: We love This Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: We love it so much that over the years I have purchased 1 for each of my daughters and for me to carry on customer visits when I install draperies. It has good suction and with all the attachments you can pretty much vacuum everything and everywhere. My girls have long hair so you have to stay on top of cleaning the beater with hair, but it is easy to do. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Shark products are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I fell in love with Shark products. I don't mind tge corded model at all. Its still lightweight yet durable. I purchased a used model, but all of the accessories arrived brand new and the unit was in pristine condition. Not a scratch on it and it came in an original box. I saved $40. Afterall it is for cleaning up dust, why do I need it brand new? I use this (my baby shark) in my basement and on my downstairs hard wood floors and kitchen tile floor in place of a broom when i deep clean. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for dog owners
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does not pick up dog hair on thick pile rugs. (If you have a Leonberger, do not buy this vacuum.) Further, in large rooms where there isn’t a wall, it will not stand up on its own; it is forever falling on the floor and never upright. On the upside, it’s very light and is ideal for hardwood floors. Just does not work on heavy pile.
customer_reviews.author: Korr

customer_reviews.title: I use it for everything
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars because for the price its a great vacuum. I haven't used a broom or dust pan since I got it. Its great on my laminate and carpet. I love the handheld part for window sills and mattresses. I does tip over so I had to install the wall hanger and I wish the canister was removable for easier emptying. Ive had a shark for years and I understand I'm getting suction not sturdy materials for the price so I'm just aware of how I treat it. I would definitely recommend this vacuum for anyone who wants performance without the $300 price tag
customer_reviews.author: Kelli P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! That says a lot from someone who does not like vacuuming but this vacuum makes it easy and fun. It's light, and easy to use. The best part is you can detach part of it to vacuum stairs so you don't have to lug the whole vacuum up the stairs. We have two cats, and it cleans up all the cat hair. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for hardwood and carpet!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I bought this vacuum cleaner and was hesitant at first spending this much money on a vacuum cleaner. But I have to say I am very pleased with it. It does great on hardwood and carpet. And the attachments that come with it are an amazing feature! I use them all the time! It’s been money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Burns

customer_reviews.title: Does a really good job
customer_reviews.text: Rug looked like new after first use. Doesn't seem to do quite as well now (only had a few months). It's kind of unwieldy and doesn't stand up by itself and also makes a horrendous noise. Sounds like motor is going but called and had CS listen and, of course, she said it sounded fine. Time will tell. I am used to a very high end canister so it's a big adjustment but I'm not terribly disappointed. I more or less knew what I was getting. We'll see if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum cleaner for the money
customer_reviews.text: We already have a vacuum cleaner just like this one. Our daughter recently bought a townhome and we gave her this vacuum cleaner as another housewarming gift. It is a great a vacuum cleaner. It is great on stairs, carpet , hardwood floors. It is light and gets under beds very well. It can be used ton vacuum out cars. Our current vacuum cleaner is over four years old and still works like new. Amazon's price is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin H. Holmes Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for long
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and small. However I noticed carpet suction wasn’t so good so after I inspection I found 3 cracks in hose. Not quite 2 years old but shouldn’t do this.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’m a house cleaning and I’m the one know about it.This is a wonderful, works great on tile, wood floors and carpet. It has a part to use on floors and another part for carpet. It came with smaller parts that can be used in a tiny areas. And another great thing is the filters can be washed. I have been using the Shark brand about 3 years. I’m very happy with it. I’m in the business of house cleaning about 14 years and this vacuum is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: When I moved into this rent house the carpet in the bedroom was terrible. Completely filthy. I got this because a friend of mine had one and loved it. I had to empty the container 4 times but it got everything up including hair, beads, and little things that I didn’t even know were there. The bare floors were so bad I would only walk around with shoes on. Never bare foot. After a once over with this you couldn’t feel a bit of grit even with bare feet. Great on carpet and bare floors alike.
customer_reviews.author: Brent W. Newell

customer_reviews.title: Best value for overall use!
customer_reviews.text: This is one powerful vacuum cleaner! I got it for my main floor, a combination of carpet and wood floors, primarily so I'd have a vacuum on each of three floors. (No cleaning lady due to COVID, so I had to make things easier for myself.) It's so powerful that I have to empty the canister every other time I use it. It's great on stairs, too. Goes under furniture and has a slim, functional design. I'm 74 and have owned lots of vacuums. I rave about this one to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: I don't like this. It's heavy in my hand and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this. It's heavy in my hand and the bare floor attachment is flimsy, cannot transition easily around the house and it will not do any kind of carpet at all so in order to do my area rugs I have to use the rug attachment which stops spinning on my one shag area rug. My other shark vacuum was awesome, it's an upright but I thought I'd try this type. I can't find the box after xmas now, but I dont see who to contact for a possible return or exchange. Not the best.. maybe its perfect if you have a small place with one type of flooring throughout.
customer_reviews.author: ROGER

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. But not anything that I was expecting. The tools and attachments are a pain, and the thing is heaven to use when cleaning anything waist level or higher. Keeping it but not recommended. Also, mind had no wall mount at all and box looked like it was used before. I bough a new one but think I got a returned one.
customer_reviews.author: justJJ

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Cleans up great, and like other vacuums better check that rolling brush for long hair...cause it'll affect the cleaning capabilities, but it's easy enough being lite weight to do so. Been great on clean-up and control for allergies for me and my sons. The filters easy to clean and change out, got a 6 month supply and have only replaced twice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dummitt

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum around
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum I have ever purchased. I bought one for my son as a housewarming gift. Visited him and used it, then ended up buying myself one because it worked so good. Hardwood, carpets, throw rugs, it does fabulous on all while light and Easy to store. Cant express enough in words how good this vacuum is
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing light weight vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this vacuum for long, so I can't comment on durability, but this is an amazing light weight vacuum for the price. Easy to store and use, it makes vacuuming and cleaning floors and carpets a breeze. After recently using this vacuum I realized that my old vacuum probably wasn't cleaning nearly as much as it should and this product had my carpets looking fresh and plush. I also like the functionality that allows the vacuum to be used as a handheld, which is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Cdgehs

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this couple of months back and is happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this couple of months back and is happy with the product. Pros : very powerful and the attachments( there are quite a few of them) are very good.I cleaned few hard to reach places in the house easily. It cord is long and using the vacuum is easy.I have been using this both on carpet and floor and work fine on all surfaces. Cons : Emptying the dust collection means you have to take the whole vacuum with you,would be nice if the dirt cup was detachable and also it is very small and fill up very fast. Net Net a must have product that has an amazing suction and is one of the best i have used .
customer_reviews.author: Mohanraj

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS VACUUM!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is the absolute best purchase I've ever made. The suction is super strong and it not only picks up the dirt but also fluffs up my carpet making it look new. It's so easy to handle and swivels into places my old upright could never go. It comes with many attachments which I'd have to buy separately with my old vacuums. Definately the perfect vacuum for me.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Best light upright vacuum you'll ever own. Unless you're a cat.
customer_reviews.text: This is now my second Shark Rocket Ultra-Light. (The first one served me with dedication for 3-4 years, until my cats finally executed their deadly revenge plan on it). And I love the Sharky 2.0 even more! Even greater suction, very light, extremely easy to use. If you're looking to rock out to your favorite tunes while cleaning (because who doesn't?!), while forgetting that you're actually doing chores, this is the vacuum for you! Shipping was ultra fast and smooth - but then, I expect nothing less of perfection from Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: N. Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This was the flimsiest piece of crap I have ever bought. What a waste of money. It doesnt suck anything up, and it falls over because it's too top heavy. Also the vacuum part doesn't even stay on the ground when vacuuming because it's too lightweight at the bottom. Sending this back asap!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to use this today. I vacuumed just my stairs with the rocket and needless to say I think my ridiculously expensive rainbow vac needs to be serviced. I vacuum once a week and it hasn't been a full week yet! I pulled about 3 cups worth of dirt/dust/hair! Could be the issue with mine and my sons allergies. We also have an english bulldog who sheds like crazy. Powerful little vacuum! The only thing I dislike is the little dust chamber is small and fills quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding  vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner vastly out performs all the pervious vacuums I've owned. The selection of add-on brushes is vast, andhas a brush or wand for ever application. I tried one of the minibrush attachments on my computer key board. I was shocked at how much dust and trash it extracted. The down side, the cleaner does not have a light and the trash collector is on the small size. However, emptying it is a snap. If I hadn't already bought this cleaner I most certainly would purchase one after trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attachments for everything
customer_reviews.text: Nimble vacuum with attachments for every area, including a set specifically for the car. Even includes a hanging hook, with template & screws. Floor attachment swivels to reach around small areas. Suction is very good. Not a bit of dog hair escapes it. Carpet attachment has a beater bar and picks up well and carpet felt fluffier after using it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F.

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about this vacuum, except the HAIR
customer_reviews.text: This is a good vacuum, it's powerful and lightweight, great for stairs. Problem is, I have lots of girls in my house with LONG hair, which never fails to wrap around the brushroll. Seems like I have to clean the brushroll every week! Now I wish I had gotten the shark with the no-hair-wrap brushroll instead.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan colton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I’ve had this vacuum for a couple of months. I wanted a stick vacuum but not one with a battery-I don’t want to need to replace the battery or time my cleaning because of low battery issues. This vacuum is nimble, light and seems to do a great job. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! It has great suction power and works great on hardwood/tile floor. Super lightweight and easy to use. It comes with 3 attachments. I wish it came with a different vacuum head. The main vacuum head it comes with is a little bulky and doesn't always fit under furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Really great vacuum! My fiancé and I both have dust allergies and our 500 square foot apartment is completely carpeted except for the bathroom and kitchen so we have been struggling. Turns out our old vacuum was just pushing dust around. But this vacuum is amazing. It's easy to clean unlike other vacuums I had in the past and it gets all the dust no problem. Only thing is be prepared to clean the roller brush on the extender piece. However that is super easy to clean too! Will definitely be purchasing shark brand from now on. This vacuum is also great on linoleum floors which is what are bathroom and kitchen have.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Versatile vacuum unit
customer_reviews.text: I was split on giving this 3 or 4 stars overall. I have to say for hardwood flooring it leaves a lot to be desired. It struggles to pick up small granules is kitty litter that my cats leave behind. For carpet it works excellent. Better than I could have expected. Ultimately for the versatility you get with floor types and even detailing the car I think it’s a 4 star overall product. A bit more suction power overall would make this thing a 5 all day.
customer_reviews.author: John Chickery

customer_reviews.title: Very good stick vac
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Shark Rocket. It is both powerful and easy to use. It is heavier than my previous stick vac but when using the beater brush on carpet, it pulls itself along. The weight is in the head where the motor is, so the weight is more an issue when using it as a hand vacuum, of which I have done only a little. I also like that the dust "bin" is high on the handle and easy to see into. I can both see what I have picked up but also know immediately if it needs emptying.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty average
customer_reviews.text: I thought the reviews were all so strong on this that i would be blown away by it. Not the case. I use this on mostly bare floors and low rugs. Didn't pick up bird feathers off the rug. Had to go over bare floor areas a few times to get things up and still left things. Not worth the money at all. I h ave cheaper vacuums that work better.
customer_reviews.author: Laroe1

customer_reviews.title: MOM KNOWS BEST<<3 THIS ONE IS A BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: WISH IT WAS CORDLESS BUT I LOVE IT!!!!!! WORKS GREAT, PUSHES MY SONS TOYS ASIDE:) STRAITE FROM CARPET TO HARDWOOD SUCKS UP GTREAT... ONE CLICK AND IM SUCKIN OUT THE SNACK DRAWER !!! TEN MIN LATER I HAVE THE BEST CAR VACUME EVER! IM POOR THIS WAS A LOT OF CASH TO SPEND ON A VACUME SO I WAS WORRIED BUT I DO NOT REGRET THIS ONE... CAME WITH TUNS OF ATTACHMENTS. LIGHT WEIGHT 5 SEC TO PUT TOGETHER AND BEST YET MY SON CAN DETACH THE TUBE AND VACUME HIS OWN ROOM:) JUST BUY IT ALREADY!!! ---MOMMY
customer_reviews.author: J. Bussey

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but strong suction!
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. This is my second one. Gave the first one to one of my sons. I was tired of him borrowing it and not getting it back to me in a timely manner. So I bought another. Love this vacuum. Light weight, easy to empty, easy to remove hair etc from brush, easy to replace filters.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Mirabell

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous swivel, but don’t feel the strong suction
customer_reviews.text: Very light and swivel like it’s no thing! Suction does not feel as strong thus hard to tell if it’s really picking up so much as the typical Shark pet hair specialized vacuume. Power gives two options to either carpet or hardwood floor with buch of replaceable attachments. Stamd atraight against the wall is a good feature for storage, however I wish to feel more suction on hand (that’s how light it feels back and forth: this could be the both pros and cons).
customer_reviews.author: Nozomi Brown

product_meta.title: Shark Rocket Corded Bagless Stick Vacuum for Carpet and Hard Floor Cleaning with Swivel Steering (HV302), Gray/Orange
product_meta.description: This corded stick vacuum easily converts into a handheld vacuum for versatile floor-to-ceiling cleaning. It's equipped with Swivel Steering for excellent control when maneuvering around furniture, and can be stored conveniently by attaching the handheld vacuum to the bottom of the wand.
feature_bullets: Converts into a handheld vacuum for versatile floor-to-ceiling cleaning
Extra tools allows you to reach tight spaces, tackle pet hair and much more for a whole-home clean
Fingertip controls to easily switch from hard floor to carpet cleaning
Hang the handheld vacuum from the hook on the bottom of the wand for convenient storage
Swivel Steering for excellent control and to maneuver around furniture. Cleaning path width (in.): 8.5
Includes: Shark Rocket Corded Stick Vacuum, Crevice Tool, Pet Multi-Tool, Precision Duster

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,178 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Precision Duster, Shark Rocket Corded Stick Vacuum, Pet Multi-Tool, Crevice Tool
